title: Let’s Go to Paradise
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Eli-san.... There’s somewhere I’d like you to come with me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Sure. Where do you want to go?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s a candy store<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>A candy store?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>You like chocolates, right, Eli-san? The candy store that Ai-san took me to the other day.... has a lot of them. There were so many.... that it was really hard to choose.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Was there really that many?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>There was. So many that you wouldn’t be able to count them. That’s why.... I want to go there with you, Eli-san.... can’t we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu. Of course we can. Thank you for inviting me to such a lovely place, Rina.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Let’s buy lots of them. Rina-chan’s board「Smile」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Then let’s eat them together after, okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
